settings.title: Benefits
settings.content:
Heat Insulation

Only available in our ceramic and premium ceramic products

Our ceramic and premium ceramic window film products can significantly reduce the amount of heat that enters your vehicle, helping to keep the interior cooler. This is especially beneficial during hot summer months or in regions with intense sunlight. By reducing heat, it can also minimize the need for air conditioning, leading to improved fuel efficiency.

IR Rejection

All of our window film products reject a significant portion of infrared radiation (IR) energy from the sun that is responsible for causing the burning discomfort on skin while also contributing to the build up of heat in a vehicle.

UV Protection

All of our window film products block a significant portion of the sun's harmful ultraviolet (UV) rays, both UVA and UVB. This protection helps to safeguard the occupants of the vehicle from potential skin damage and reduces the risk of skin cancer caused by prolonged exposure to the sun.

Glare Reduction

Excessive glare from sunlight or bright headlights can be a major distraction while driving, compromising your visibility and safety. All of our window film products can effectively reduce glare, providing a more comfortable driving experience and reducing eye strain.

Exceptional Optical Clarity

Optical clarity is an important consideration when selecting window film, particularly for automotive applications where visibility and safety are paramount. Our window film products provide a natural view of the road without compromising the driver's ability to see clearly and perceive the surroundings accurately.

Boosts Privacy

Tinted windows offer increased privacy and security for you and your belongings inside the vehicle. They make it more difficult for potential thieves to see inside, deterring break-ins and protecting your valuables.

No Fading or Discoloration

Renowned for their exceptional color retention properties over time, all of our window film products maintain their original shade and appearance even after prolonged exposure to sunlight and harsh weather conditions. This ensures long-lasting aesthetic appeal and reduces the risk of fading or discoloration.

Interior Protection

Direct sunlight can cause fading, cracking, or discoloration of your vehicle's interior, including the dashboard, seats, and upholstery. Our window film products help to block the harmful UV rays, thus reducing the damage caused by sun exposure and extending the lifespan of your vehicle's interior.

Compliments Most Factory Tint

Matching factory window tint can help maintain the vehicle's original aesthetic and appearance while adding the desired benefits of aftermarket window film, such as heat reduction, UV protection, and glare reduction.

Energy Efficient

By reducing heat transfer through the windows, our window film products can contribute to better energy efficiency in your vehicle. It helps to stabilize the interior temperature, reducing the load on the air conditioning system and improving fuel economy.

Easy To Install

With our pre-cut patterns, installers can easily align and apply the film without the need for extensive cutting or trimming.

settings.title: Purchasing Instructions
settings.content:
Step 1: Pick a technology

Enhance your vehicle with these high-performance films, offering powerful heat insulation, IR rejection, and UV protection. Whether you prefer the sleek, dark aesthetics of carbon or the advanced performance of ceramic, our pre-cut patterns ensure a seamless installation experience, giving your windows a stylish look while keeping you stylish and protected.

Carbon

Experience the perfect blend of style and performance with our carbon film, offering a sleek, stylish finish and excellent solar protection.

Ceramic

Experience impressive heat insulation, solar protection, and style with our ceramic window film. Offering a great balance between performance and affordability, it ensures optimal comfort and a sleek appearance for your vehicle.

Premium Ceramic

For those seeking the ultimate in heat insulation, solar protection, and style, our premium ceramic window film provides the highest performance while preserving a sleek and stylish appearance; it's the perfect choice for those who demand the best in window film technology.

Step 2: Enter your vehicle details

To purchase the perfect pre-cut window film pattern for your vehicle, simply provide us with your vehicle details. Enter your make, model, year, and VIN to ensure a precise fit for a seamless installation. Our tailored patterns will guarantee a hassle-free and professional result, giving your vehicle the performance and style it deserves.

Step 3: Choose your shade

Choosing the right shade of window tint for your vehicle is an important decision, balancing style with performance. Consider your local regulations before purchasing. Additionally, think about your preferences for privacy, heat insulation, solar protection, and visibility. Lighter shades provide a more subtle look with less performance, while darker shades offer enhanced privacy and higher performance.

Step 4: Proceed to checkout

We're excited to help you transform your vehicle. When you've completed the above steps, head to checkout to finalize your purchase. Our secure payment process ensures a seamless transaction, and our team is ready to assist you if you have any questions or need further assistance. Pre-cut patterns typically ship out within 48 business hours.

Step 5: Install your pattern

Installing a pre-cut window film pattern is a straightforward process that can be done with ease. Thoroughly clean your windows, align the pattern accurately, and apply the film using a solution and squeegee, ensuring any air bubbles are smoothed out. If the window is curved, you will need a heat gun to shrink the film to the glass.

View Resources

Step 6: Caring For Your Window Film

Proper care and maintenance will prolong the lifespan and appearance of your window film. To keep it in optimal condition, avoid cleaning the film for at least 30 days after installation. When cleaning, use a non-abrasive, ammonia-free cleaner and a soft, lint-free cloth or sponge. By following these guidelines, you can ensure that your window film stays looking great for years to come.

settings.title: Shades
settings.content: The lower the percentage, the darker the shade. The higher the percentage, the lighter the shade.

settings.title: Performance Data
settings.content: All tested materials were applied on a ¼” clear glass surface in accordance with industry standard tests. The intended purpose of the data provided is for comparison purposes only.

settings.title: Return & Refund Policy
settings.content:
Please be aware that we are unable to accept returns or provide refunds for pre-cut patterns of window film or paint protection film as each order is tailored to suit the individual specifications of our customers' vehicles.

Before making a purchase, it is essential that buyers take the initiative to acquaint themselves with the local regulations regarding window film usage as well as the proper installation methods.

Flexfilm holds no liability for any direct, indirect, or incidental damages resulting from the appropriate or inappropriate application of our products. We do not offer refunds for pre-cut patterns based on buyer's remorse or suboptimal outcomes, particularly for non-professionals lacking the requisite licenses or certifications.By purchasing a pre-cut pattern from Flexfilm, you expressly consent to adhere to our established return and refund policy.

settings.text: Pre-cut window film patterns offer a convenient and precise solution for window tinting. With patterns specifically designed for different vehicle makes and models, they ensure a perfect fit, saving time and effort. Whether for DIY enthusiasts or professional installers, pre-cut patterns eliminate the need for tedious cutting and trimming, resulting in a seamless and professional-looking installation.
